property.name: pageNames
property.label: Page Names
property.description: A comma-separated string containing (in order) the names for each of the progress bar sections

property.name: currentPage
property.label: Current Page
property.description: The current page this progress bar is living on

property.name: completedPages
property.label: Completed Pages
property.description: A comma-separated string containing the pages that have been completed. It's recommended to assign this to a variable that you update as users finish screens

property.name: visitedPages
property.label: Visited Pages
property.description: A comma-separated string containing the pages that have been visited. It's recommended to assign this to a variable that you update as users finish screens

property.name: allowSkippingPages
property.label: Allow Skipping to Non-Visited Pages
property.description: Should the user be allowed to use the progress bar to visit pages not naturally visited through the flow. This would allow the user, for example, to use the progress bar to visit the last page immediately after loading the flow. Works best for non-sequential flows.

property.name: pageNavigation
property.label: Page to Navigate To
property.description: Holds the value of the page the user wishes to navigate to through the progress bar
